General.Name: Biomedix Incubator Ltd
General.Description: Biomedix Incubator Ltd is a venture capital firm and accelerator specializing in start-up and incubation investments. The firm seeks to invest in life science sector including medical equipment, green technology, software, and alternative energy. Biomedix Incubator Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel with an additional office in New York, New York.
